description: Related multi table for the Counts Table - Comment (I RFL 513) item. Each line in the related multi item represents a line of text.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated external appointment in the referral record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple lines of comment text associated with an external appointment in the referral record.

columns.name: EXT_SVC_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment text associated with the line number of one of the multiple lines of comment text associated with an external appointment in the referral record.
